column4: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions
column5: June 8 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Thursday:

column4: EU seeks to expedite police requests for data from tech firms
column5: BRUSSELS The European Union wants to make it easier for law enforcement authorities to get electronic evidence directly from tech companies  such as Facebook Inc  and Alphabet Inc's  Google  even when stored in another European country.

column4: Microsoft agrees to buy U.S.-Israeli cyber firm Hexadite
column5: TEL AVIV Microsoft  said on Thursday it has agreed to acquire Hexadite  a U.S.-Israeli provider of technology to automate responses to cyber attacks.

column4: Microsoft agrees to buy U.S.-Israeli cyber firm Hexadite
column5: TEL AVIV  June 8 Microsoft said on Thursday it has agreed to acquire Hexadite  a U.S.-Israeli provider of technology to automate responses to cyber attacks.

column4: US STOCKS-S&P  Dow flat after Comey testimony; Nasdaq at record high
column5: * Former FBI director says no doubt Russia meddled in U.S. election
